api_list.api_description: Get one or multiple pairs by token address

required_parameters.name: tokenAddresses
required_parameters.description: One or multiple, comma-separated token addresses (up to 30 addresses)

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Query may include pair address, token address, token name or token symbol

query: Find me all pairs related to a specific token address and search for pairs matching a query involving USDC.
